articles.description: The Dallas Cowboys claimed their first playoff berth since the 2018 season after the Tennessee Titans defeated the San Francisco 49ers.
articles.content:
FRISCO, Texas Nearly two years ago to the day, the Dallas Cowboys hired Mike McCarthy with a clear goal: find postseason success.
